statement_text: H5N1 has infected a staggering array of birds and animals, including mammals, over the past few years, but it [H5N1] has not proved capable of spreading easily among people.

rationale: The segment uses 'staggering' to describe the array of infected animals (scope), not as an intensifier on a risk-adjective describing the virus itself. It also notes the virus 'has not proved capable of spreading easily'.
